EdgeX UI is a graphical user interface for EdgeX. It is intended for demonstration and development use to manage and monitor a single instance of EdgeX Foundry.
For a command-line interface, see https://snapcraft.io/edgex-cli
**Snap usage instructions** https://github.com/edgexfoundry/edgex-ui-go/blob/main/snap/README.md
**Source code and more info** https://github.com/edgexfoundry/edgex-ui-go
**Getting started** * v2.1: https://docs.edgexfoundry.org/2.1/getting-started/tools/Ch-GUI * v2.2: https://docs.edgexfoundry.org/2.2/getting-started/tools/Ch-GUI
**EdgeX Documentation** https://docs.edgexfoundry.org
**Reference platform snap** https://snapcraft.io/edgexfoundry
